author: bridge-bot
content:
<kevaundray> We've merged https://github.com/bluealloy/revm/pull/2786 

It is a generalization of the proposal by @jpwang -- we would still go with that idea, but it will be enforced by the guest program and not by revm directly. 

Usage:

- Implement the `Crypto` trait on some type `T`
- Call the `install_crypto` public function with type `T`

Crypto trait is here: https://github.com/bluealloy/revm/blob/df467931c4b1b8b620ff2cb9f62501c7abc3ea03/crates/precompile/src/interface.rs#L70

install_crypto function is here: https://github.com/bluealloy/revm/blob/df467931c4b1b8b620ff2cb9f62501c7abc3ea03/crates/precompile/src/interface.rs#L13

<kevaundray> Zeth has also recently switched to using upstream `reth-stateless` which includes the optimized `debug_executionWitness` for faster data fetching.

PR here: https://github.com/risc0/zeth/pull/170

The plan is to upstream some of the changes made by R0 into reth, further reducing the diff between the zkEVM specific guest program and the stateless validation function that is maintained by the EL
